text: The 1975-76 Austrian Football Championship was organized by the Austrian Football Association. The single-track Nationalliga served as a substructure to the Bundesliga. The Regionalliga East (Vienna, Lower Austria, Burgenland) and the regional leagues of Salzburg, Tyrol, Vorarlberg, Carinthia, Upper Austria and Styria served as the third performance level. The Bundesliga was contested by 10 teams. They met four times throughout the entire season. ==Final table== Pl. Name M W D L P 1\. SpG FK Austria-WAC 36 21 10 5 52 2\. SSW Wacker Innsbruck 36 18 9 9 45 3\. SK Rapid Wien 36 17 6 13 40 4\. SV Austria Salzburg 36 14 11 11 39 5\. FC Admira/Wacker 36 13 10 13 36 6\. SK VÖEST Linz 36 13 9 14 35 7\. LASK 36 10 11 15 31 8\. SK Sturm Graz 36 11 8 17 30 9\. GAK 36 9 11 16 29 10\.
